events.description: Doors open at 630PM. Performance begins at 8PM. This is a 21 AND OVER event. House of Blues Chicago is a standing room only venue, all tickets are General Admission unless otherwise stated. There is a dress code for this event:Business Casual. If you have any questions in regards to this event please call us at 312.923.2000 *All support acts are subject to change without notice.*
